org.webcurator.domain.model.auth
Class Role

java.lang.Object
  org.webcurator.domain.model.auth.Role
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, AgencyOwnable
public class Role
extends java.lang.Object
implements AgencyOwnable, java.io.Serializable

The Role class defines the relationship between users and privilege within the WCT system. Users are assigned to roles, that in turn have privileges. A user may belong to more than one role.

Author:
bprice
See Also:
